subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Miami Dolphins added quarterback Chad Pennington to their injury report with a sore foot. He is listed as probable for Sunday’s game against the Oakland Raiders. If he cannot play, the rookie Chad Henne will make his first N.F.L. start.
